snippet: In comments broadcast on Thursday, Russian President Vladimir Putin joked about the reputed benefits of group sex for the lazy as he attacked the morals of three women from the punk band Pussy Riot.
abstract: In comments broadcast on Thursday, Russian President Vladimir Putin joked about the reputed benefits of group sex for the lazy as he attacked the morals of three women from the punk band Pussy Riot.

headline.main: Putin Jokes About Orgies to Cast Pussy Riot Protesters as Degenerates
